camel.sink.path.stream.name: camel.sink.path.stream
camel.sink.path.stream.description: Name of the stream channel used by the endpoint to exchange messages.

camel.sink.endpoint.backpressureStrategy.name: camel.sink.endpoint.backpressureStrategy
camel.sink.endpoint.backpressureStrategy.description: The backpressure strategy to use when pushing events to a slow subscriber. One of: [BUFFER] [OLDEST] [LATEST]

camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.name: camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer
camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding.name: camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding
camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding.description: Whether the endpoint should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities

camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous.name: camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous
camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous.description: Sets whether synchronous processing should be strictly used, or Camel is allowed to use asynchronous processing (if supported).

camel.component.reactive-streams.threadP.name: camel.component.reactive-streams.threadPoolMaxSize
camel.component.reactive-streams.threadP.description: The maximum number of threads used by the reactive streams internal engine.

camel.component.reactive-streams.threadP.name: camel.component.reactive-streams.threadPoolMinSize
camel.component.reactive-streams.threadP.description: The minimum number of threads used by the reactive streams internal engine.

camel.component.reactive-streams.threadP.name: camel.component.reactive-streams.threadPoolName
camel.component.reactive-streams.threadP.description: The name of the thread pool used by the reactive streams internal engine.

camel.component.reactive-streams.backpre.name: camel.component.reactive-streams.backpressureStrategy
camel.component.reactive-streams.backpre.description: The backpressure strategy to use when pushing events to a slow subscriber. One of: [BUFFER] [OLDEST] [LATEST]

camel.component.reactive-streams.lazySta.name: camel.component.reactive-streams.lazyStartProducer
camel.component.reactive-streams.lazySta.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.component.reactive-streams.basicPr.name: camel.component.reactive-streams.basicPropertyBinding
camel.component.reactive-streams.basicPr.description: Whether the component should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities

camel.component.reactive-streams.reactiv.name: camel.component.reactive-streams.reactiveStreamsEngineConfiguration
camel.component.reactive-streams.reactiv.description: To use an existing reactive stream engine configuration.

camel.component.reactive-streams.service.name: camel.component.reactive-streams.serviceType
camel.component.reactive-streams.service.description: Set the type of the underlying reactive streams implementation to use. The implementation is looked up from the registry or using a ServiceLoader, the default implementation is DefaultCamelReactiveStreamsService
